page.title: 13Employment in the area
page.content: Manor Farm Dairy employs a lot of people like the milkmen who deliver the milk,the factory men,and all the people who clean up. Public houses employ people like the barmen and the cleaners. Supermarkets need people to stack up the shelves,run the cash desks,and drive the lorries.There are two large supermarkets in Worle. Sage & Down quarry site employs a lot of people.There are the quarry people who make the breeze blocks and who load the lorries.There are also the lorry-drivers who drive the blocks to the destinations. In Worle there are some small factories which need employees to work the machines. Finally there are a lot of schools in our area which need a lot of teachers,caretakers and dinner-ladies.
